entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
